title: W&B Kaggle Error: RecursionError: maximum recursion depth exceeded while calling a Python object
body:
When running https://www.kaggle.com/ultralytics/yolov3 notebook, training YOLOv3-tiny after running wandb disabled, I get the following error, which seems to originate in the wandb package. Notebook has been saved in this state to easily reproduce. 

@AyushExel could you take a look at this and inform the right people?

```bash
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 492, in <module>
    train(hyp, opt, device, tb_writer, wandb)
  File "train.py", line 379, in train
    torch.save(ckpt, last)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 372, in save
    _save(obj, opened_zipfile, pickle_module, pickle_protocol)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/torch/serialization.py", line 476, in _save
    pickler.dump(obj)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/dummy.py", line 129, in __getattr__
    return self[attr]
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/dummy.py", line 135, in __getitem__
    dummy = Dummy()
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python3.7/site-packages/wandb/dummy.py", line 6, in __init__
    object.__setattr__(self, "___dict", {})
RecursionError: maximum recursion depth exceeded while calling a Python object
```

![Screenshot 2020-11-27 at 13 57 32](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/26833433/100451977-8fd2ba80-30b8-11eb-8299-77a816943c2d.jpg)

## Reproduce

1. Go to https://www.kaggle.com/ultralytics/yolov3 and run Setup cell.
2. Run Train cell.
